name: Sohosuite
body:
SohoSuite is a tool suite for Windows designed to collect all of the tools available for
developing and modifying the Amazon Kindle Fire HD (7") 2013 into one
User Interface to make things as easy as possible for endusers.  

#####SohoSuite is the ***4.0*** replacement for KindleSuite
#####SohoSuite is in current development. It is not recommended that you use this program unless you are a tester for SecretDevWork.

SohoSuite includes the following features:

* Backup & Restore Apps
* Factory Restore
* Root
* Install Gapps
* Install ROM's

You can find **guides** in our [wiki](https://github.com/secretdevwork/SohoSuite/wiki)  
More help in our [community](https://plus.google.com/communities/115612726860884592519)

---
_For Unix/Mac please take a look at our wiki_
